ai-tha-ap274:1.3_0: came to me in a mind-made body,
ai-tha-ap274:2.2_0: and after worshipping the supreme among men.
ai-tha-ap274:2.4_0: the sesame seeds made of bones.
ai-tha-ap274:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap274:3.4_0: this fruit is made of iron,
ai-tha-ap274:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Tissaka.
ai-tha-ap274:7.1_0: The second rainy season residence near the Elder Tissaka
